review.title: Prediction with expert advice for the Brier game
review.abstract: In this technical report I show that the Brier game of prediction is perfectly mixable and find the optimal learning rate and substitution function for it. These results are straightforward, but the computations are surprisingly messy.
histories: 34 pages, 22 figures, 2 tables. The conference version (8 pages) is published in the ICML 2008 Proceedings
